summary:
Minimal ENB Final Edition:

Welcome to my Page. Please make sure to read everything carefully. Because that will save you a lot of Problems.

My final (and last) Version now with great Colors and Lighting, finely tuned Effects and very good Performance.
Wish you much Fun with it.
***************************
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/logobeuhla5tzg.jpg[/img][/url]

***************************
[color=#00ffff][size=4]Minimal ENB Final Edition:[/size][/color]

Welcome to my Page. Please make sure to read everything carefully. Because that will save you a lot of Problems.

My final (and last) Version now with great Colors and Lighting, finely tuned Effects and very good Performance.
Wish you much Fun with it.
[color=#ff0000]***************************[/color]
designed and optimized for:
Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB
Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - Lite
[color=#ff0000]***************************
***************************[/color]

[color=#ffff00]Important:[/color]
You must have these options set in your SkyrimPrefs.ini that is located in your Documents/Skyrim folder:

fGamma=1.0000
iMaxAnisotropy=0
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=3
iWaterMultiSamples=0
iMultiSample=0
bFXAAEnabled=0
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bDrawShadows=1

Mod Organizer Users:
Mod Organizer makes and uses its own Skyrim.ini and Skyrimprefs.ini
located at Mod Organizer/profiles/your profiles name.

Turn off Anisotropic Filtering and Antialiasing in Skyrim Launcher and in your video card software. ENB’s AF is enabled by default.
If game crashing on startup, make sure you are not running XFire, Afterburner, EVGA and
other kind of that tools. Don't run manually enbhost.exe, it will be automatically started if memory
manager is activated in enblocal.ini(enabled).

"My game crashes (CTD) before I even get to the menu"
First ensure to have correct language in your Skyrim.ini, for example if you are using my ini-files you will have to adjust "sLanguage=ENGLISH" to your in-game used language.
After a fresh Windows installation (or you have a new Win 8, Win 8.1) you must update your DirectX runtime for DX9. Extract the files and start DXSETUP.exe.
You probably either need DirectX updated or you installed a mod without installing another mod that it needs. Use LOOT to find out if it's the latter. LOOT requires Internet Explorer 11 to generate its report.

Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB and Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - Lite is also highly recommended.
[color=#ff0000]***************************[/color]
about VideoMemorySize in enblocal.ini:

Formula is: VRAM + RAM - 2048
[color=#ff0000]***************************[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Installation:[/color]
1. Download and copy all contents of the Minimal ENB Final Edition to your root Skyrim folder.
2. Download [color=#ffff00]version 0264[/color] of enbseries on [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]enb.dev[/url] . Open the zip and copy the d3d9.dll from the Wrapper folder into your root Skyrim folder.
3. Download and install Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB (just the .esp).
4. Download and install  Enhanced Lighting for ENB ( ELE) - Lite.
5. Download and install Skyrim Particle Patch for ENB.
6. Download and install Skyrim Subsurface Scattering Patch for ENB[color=#ffff00].[/color]
[color=#ff0000]***************************[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Recommended:[/color]
Realistic Water Two
Ethereal Clouds
SFO 2.0
[color=#ff0000]***************************[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Incompatible Mods:[/color]
Climates of Tamriel
Relighting Skyrim
Pure Weather
[color=#ff0000]***************************[/color]
Credits and thanks to:
Boris - for ENBseries
Matso
Confidence Man (NLA)
-- JayZ -- (ELE)

Thank you for downloading and using [color=#00ffff]Minimal ENB Final Edition[/color]. :-)
ewi65
[color=#ff0000]********[/color]
This ENB preset is also prohibited to be uploaded on other sites.
[color=#ff0000]********[/color]
